about_the_game:
Dice for Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden patterned after Mama and Carrier.
*The design may not be changed in some circumstances.
*Product bundles that include this content are also available. Please take care to avoid making duplicate purchases.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1/10 64-bit (ver.1909 and above)
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Maximum resolution: 1920x1080. Monitor capable of 60FPS+ required, Supports Keyboard, Mouse and XINPUT gamepads
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1/10 64-bit (ver.1909 and above)
  • Processor: AMD A8-7600 / Intel® Core™ i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (VRAM 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11.0 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Maximum resolution: 1920x1080. Monitor capable of 60FPS+ required, Supports Keyboard, Mouse and XINPUT gamepads
